item.description:
There are a variety of important legal issues that small business owners must be aware of. Starting with the formation of the business and determining what type of legal entity is the best one, to signing leases, hiring employees, signing contracts, to trademarks and protecting personal assets the choices can overwhelming. This session will provide an overview of many of the most important issues that business owners have to face.

The speaker will be Atty. Jeffrey Donaldson with the law firm of Mirick O'Connell in Worcester.

Date: Thursday, October 21, 2010
Time: Registration 8:45 a.m.; Program 9:00 a.m. - 12:00 noon
Location: Grace Conference Room, Higgins University Center at Clark University, Worcester (directions)
Cost: $39 - prepayment required to reserve a space
Contact: MSBDC at Clark University 508-793-7615 or via email at sbdc@clarku.edu. Click on link below to register online.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Legal Issues for Small Business
